name: Yu-Gi-Oh! 7 Trials to Glory: World Championship Tournament 2005
summary: It is a game in the series of Yu-Gi-Oh video games made by Konami for the Nintendo Game Boy Advance portable video game system. The game is initially an RPG with strategy mixed in,

alternative_names.name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Day of the Duelist: World Championship Tournament 2005
